title: ENIAC
description: The Electronic Numerical Integrator and Computer (ENIAC) was among the earliest electronic general-purpose computers.

title: IBM 305 RAMAC
description: First computer with a hard disk drive, storing up to 5 MB of data.

title: Intel 4004
description: The first commercially available microprocessor, revolutionizing computing.

title: Apple II
description: One of the first successful mass-produced microcomputers.

title: IBM PC
description: Set the standard for personal computers with open architecture.

title: World Wide Web
description: Tim Berners-Lee invents the World Wide Web, making the internet accessible.

title: iPhone
description: Apple's iPhone redefined the smartphone industry with a touch interface and app ecosystem.

title: AI-Powered Laptops
description: Modern laptops integrate AI chips to accelerate local machine learning tasks.
